attributes.action: insist that all persons travelling to and from the UK remove their veils for immigration and safety checks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Muslim style head veils should be removed to allow immigration officers to check identity, this should be done in a private area with respect. Anyone who refuses should NOT be allowed to travel. Removing head veils for these checks should be compulsory.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "insist that all persons travelling to and from the UK remove their veils for immigration and safety checks."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
